page.title: 08HOUSING-MODERN IDEAS
page.content: High blocks of flats ,a modern library and shops are built close together here and there are schools and halls where people can meet . Plenty of buses run through this area and we could see a{Barrage Balloon} (which was used during the last war) high up in the sky above us advertising an Open Day at a car market .Lots of streets are called after Scottish Glens .Most of the houses are on one side of the main road while on the other side you can find two huge stores with a garden centre .Here you can buy lots of furniture and put it together yourself .There used to be a farm here but it was burned down .There are still some green fields although new houses are being built which will cover them up .
